title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a RACING SERIES
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACING SERIES" "DTM" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Deutsche Tourenwagen-Masters | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Deutsche Tourenwagen-Masters | string |
  | short_name |  | string |
  | founded |  | number |
  | defunct |  | number |
  | organized_by |  | string |
  | vehicle_type |  | string |
